HEADDER.TITLE: Create your digital menu for free
HEADDER.DESC: Create your digital menus quickly and easily with QR code,  multiple languages, letting your customers view the menu on their own device.

ABOUT.TITLE_2: We enhance customer engagement, streamline operations, and drive success with our user-friendly technology, Let’s elevate your dining experience togethe.
ABOUT.DESC_2: Be a step ahead with Digital Menu
ABOUT.DESC_3: At Digital Menu, we specialize in transforming dining experiences with cutting-edge digital menu solutions. Our mission is to enhance customer engagement and streamline restaurant operations with user-friendly technology. Committed to innovation and excellence, we partner with foodservice businesses to drive success and sustainability. Discover how we can elevate your dining experience.
ABOUT.DESC_4: Your menus are available digitally and on your own website, letting you reduce costs and keeping your menu up-to-date in an easy and inexpensive way.

OUR_SERVICES.TITLE_2: Our digital menus improve customer experience, streamline operations, and boost sales with interactive displays and real-time updates, all while reducing paper waste.
OUR_SERVICES.SERVICE_TITLE_1: Easy access, with QR code or link
OUR_SERVICES.SERVICE_DESC_1: You can easily open a menu using a QR code placed at the entrance or at the tables in the restaurant. Restaurants can share the link on social Media . Alternatively, you can search online for the name of the restaurant.
OUR_SERVICES.SERVICE_DESC_2: The menu is online and always accessible: it can be read from any location, at any time. You can easily find the menu by searching online and you can also add a link to the menu from any website or app.
OUR_SERVICES.SERVICE_DESC_3: Restaurants can create and update their digital menu directly, at any time, cutting the cost and offering a better menu. The menu is dynamic and can also include daily menus or new products, without an additional piece of paper
OUR_SERVICES.SERVICE_DESC_4: Customers can view your Free QR Code Menu from  their devices, Our adaptable display ensures clear and focused visibility from any mobile device, And as a bonus - you are also saving on printing and designing costs.
OUR_SERVICES.SERVICE_DESC_5: Personalize your menu, change the style, color, layout and more to define your own menu  based on your specific branding and style preferences.
OUR_SERVICES.SERVICE_DESC_6: By using Digital Menu you are investing in digitalization and sustainability, along with all our websites being powered by renewable energy.

FOOTER.SUBSCRIBE_DESC: Stay up to date with our latest news and properties
FOOTER.FEEDBACK_DESC: We want your feedback about everything
FOOTER.ADDRESS: Cairo: Abbas El Akkad, Nasr City.

OUR_CLIENTS.TITLE: Our Clients
OUR_CLIENTS.DESC: We serve a variety of restaurants and cafes with our digital menu solutions. Our technology boosts customer engagement and streamlines operations. Explore how our clients thrive with us and how we can support your success.

OUR_PRICING.TITLE: Our Pricing
OUR_PRICING.DESC: Our digital menu solutions come with flexible, budget-friendly pricing to fit any restaurant or cafe. Find the perfect plan to boost customer engagement and streamline operations.
OUR_PRICING.FREE_DURATION: Try Digital Menu 14 days for free
